MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G65 postcode area of Kilsyth. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45AM following reports of a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.25AM on 16th November 2020.
